personal_information:
I am a problem solver, fueled by curiosity and a passion for learning new things. My goal is to leverage my creativity and skill set in computer science to solve complex real-world problems.
 I am committed to expanding my skills as a software engineer and therefore I devote considerable time to experimenting with modern web-frameworks, functional programming, and systems programming languages. My specific areas of interest include the Linux operating system, open source software, and blockchain technology.

job1.job_desc_2: Django, Python, PostgreSQL, ReactJS, MobX, Docker, Cypress, Linux.
job1.job_desc_4: Interacting directly with customers and translating their needs into software solutions.

job2.job_desc_1: Writing a parser in Python which transpiles a custom language into C++ source code.

job3.job_desc_1: Implementing a modern web application using ReactJS and MaterialUI.
job3.job_desc_2: Responsible for Continuous Integration on Google Cloud using Docker.

job4.job_desc_1: Developing an interface for customers using ReactJS and REST API which automates simulation processes.
job4.job_desc_2: Workflow via GitLab CI and testing with Jest.
